content:
hey hey,

These two were nominated for backporting, which we accepted last week by adding beta-accepted:

- [87863] Fix Windows Command::env("PATH")
- [88031] Make \`BuildHasher\` object safe

Is there anything else we should do to make sure they don't get lost? I'm assuming this label is checked before releasing the new version, but I wanted to check to be sure.
@Mara someone from release (usually mark) periodically goes throught beta-nominated+beta-accepted and batches them
no further action is needed unless there is a conflict and the patches can't be applied (like if the whole module was refactored between releases)
